main.description: A declaration of a dendogram observation for an organization

dendogram.description: An SVG of the dendogram uploaded as blob

createdAt.description: The date and time of the creation of the record

name.description: Name or title of the dendogram (e.g., 'Flora Phylogenetic Tree - Site A 2025')

description.description: Description of what this dendogram shows

siteRef.description: AT-URI reference to the site this dendogram represents

analysisDate.description: When the phylogenetic analysis was performed

analysisMethod.description: Method used to generate the dendogram (e.g., 'Maximum Likelihood with RAxML', 'Neighbor-Joining')

dataSource.description: Source of the sequence or trait data used in the analysis

taxonCount.description: Number of taxa represented in the dendogram

rootTaxon.description: The root taxon of the tree (e.g., 'Plantae')

treeType.description: Type of tree represented in the dendogram

thumbnail.description: Thumbnail preview image of the dendogram

taxonGroups.description: Which taxonomic groups are represented in the dendogram
